changes.change: - Fixed crashes on iOS 9.0.x when trying to lock/unlock orientation via the button.
- Fixed potential process (related to UIKit) crashes - Added option to modify button roundness and size - Added option to add text underneath the icon
- No known data of the changes
- Added Activator action called Control Window - Added Whitelist to disable button in selected applications - Added option to disable button on homescreen
- Fixed preferences not loading in sandboxed applications - Added option to unlock orientation on view change - Added Alternative mode with blacklist - Added Activator actions
- No known data of the changes
